item.text: I'm fascinated by what Matt Novak calls the "[http://www.paleofuture.com/ paleofuture]," that is the visions of the future from the past. To that end, I've started a series this year on Hack Education (and on Medium) that attempts to capture some of this. In many ways, it's a history of ed-tech. But it's also an uncovering and rediscovering and recapturing that history. As such, it's also an attempt to redirect the storytelling of the future...
